long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LPU Auto Login is a free extension designed for LPU students and faculty members. Its primary goal is to help users log in to LPU portals like UMS, LPULive, and OAS without having to manually enter credentials each time. The extension securely stores your username and password, allowing you to log in automatically.

This tool provides seamless access to students and faculty, enabling them to quickly view their course details, grades, schedules, and other important information.

Key Features:

Automatically log in to LPU portals.
Securely store and manage login credentials.
Free to use with no hidden charges.
Easy to use, lightweight, and efficient.
The goal of this extension is to provide a convenient and time-saving solution for the LPU community, so you can efficiently manage your academics and work.
